We have code snippet: It's from instructor/dsl/iterable.py. There's a class variable task_type. There's a static async method extract_json_async(completion: AsyncGenerator[Any, None], mode: Mode) -> AsyncGenerator[str, None].

The method loops over async generator completion, yields JSON chunks based on mode. Handles various modes: ANTHROPIC_JSON, ANTHROPIC_TOOLS, FUNCTIONS (deprecated), JSON, MD_JSON, JSON_SCHEMA, CEREBRAS_JSON, FIREWORKS_JSON, TOOLS, TOOLS_STRICT, FIREWORKS_TOOLS, WRITER_TOOLS. If mode unsupported, raise NotImplementedError. Catches AttributeError and ignores.

Thus business logic: streaming extraction of JSON content from LLM response chunks according to mode.

Inputs: async generator of completion chunks, mode enum.

Outputs: async generator yielding string JSON fragments.
